commentBody: Much ado about nothing. NAPS nor D-1 team participation gets you a pass as a Midshipmen. My roomie who came from NAPS ( 1969) flunked out and returned to the Fleet. Joe does not address the overall trend of professionalization of college athletics and how many teams exist today as compared to 50 years ago. The athletes at those institutions are not really qualified for the entrance to the schools who accept them and could not hold a candle to the life outcomes of Service Academy grads. Check the data.
